text: Ara yakhana tara tadera pita yebhabe adesa karechilena sebhabe'i prabesa karala, takhana allahâ€Œra hukumera biparite ta tadera kono kaje asala na; iyaâ€™kuba sudhu tara manera ekati abhipraya purna karachilena [1] ara abasya'i tini amadera deya siksaya jnanabana chilena. Kintu besira bhaga manusa'i jane na
